A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Something is off with the jedi. they're suppose to be cool\, calm\, collective. Not anxious\, hyper and emotional. I'll accept the sith being a little emorionally rageful cause that's them dealing with their darkness and anger. Also WTF is the deal with snoke? He could have been a great sith with an amazing backstory\, but nothing. And Luke dusting off his shoulders was the stupidest crap ever. Wtf is happening to our beloved star wars? It's turning into a ham and cheese.
